content: simple collar crochet pattern by sophia orquiz level easy supplies -hook size k-101/2 6 50 mm or larger for this pattern i used a m-13 9 0 mm crochet hook -bulky weight 5 yarn 1 skein for this pattern i used a 98% acrylic/2% polyester mix -tapestry needle -stitch markers to mark the end of your row -scissors *when selecting your materials you may want to consider whether they can be washed or not terminology -st stitch -sts stitches -slp st slip_stitch -chain chain -single_crochet single_crochet -half_double_crochet half_double_crochet -double_crochet double_crochet for this pattern you will need to know how to slip_stitch and create a chain the pattern consists of the single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet stitch double_crochet stitch and turning chains this pattern will be worked in row final dimensions/measurements the collar should be at least 22-23 inches long when it is laid flat and open and about 3-4 inches wide/high depending on gauge and hook size you can adjust the length to your liking by adding or removing chains and/or changing hook size you can adjust the width/height by adding more row or less row just be sure to end your chain on an even number so your row and bottom trim evens out please note you may sell finished product you may not post share or sell this pattern as your own i would like credit where credit is due if you have any questions or confusion regarding pattern please do not hesitate to contact me via email at mamasophs@hotmail com © 06/19/2023 sophia orquiz all rights reserved https //mamasophs square site tag me on instagram @mamasophsartsandcrafts linktree https //linktr ee/mamasophs
